The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Griffin W. Howard, Defendant-Appellant.(No. 72-342;Fifth DistrictSeptember 19, 1974.Robert E. Farrell and Allen L. Wiederer, both of State Appellate Defender’s Office, of Chicago, for appellant.Nicholas G. Byron, State’s Attorney, of Edwardsville, for the People.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
